subject: Re: EVP maker
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Thank you for listening and confirming, Stefan.  I thought the 'talk therapy' remark was 
very funny as well.  There was nothing removed between that statement and my having 
asked if anybody was there.  The response was immediate.  Very cool.

I like various EVP techniques .... recording in silence, or using various backgrounds, and 
I'm a big fan of manual radio sweep.  I also have had positive results with the Radio Shack 
hacks, and I'm having a good time with my MiniBox.  So, now I have added EVP Maker to 
my list.  Fabulous!  :-)
